message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Given its value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is truly unique and in high demand. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000. This feels like a fair compromise that reflects the true worth of what's being offered.

I understand that the product has unique value, but I'm still not convinced that $1,350,000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,250,000. That's the highest I'm willing to pay.
